Headline: Israeli military strikes Gaza for second time this week, after incendiary balloons spark eight fires in southern Israel  - CNN
Text: By Oren Liebermann and Amir Tal, CNNUpdated 6:05 PM ET, Thu June 17, 2021  (CNN)The Israeli military struck targets in Gaza for the second time this week, the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) said in a statement, after a continued barrage of incendiary balloons sparked eight fires in southern Israel.Reporting contributed by CNN's Hadas Gold.
